subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer, who has chased down many marks, including 17 Grand Slam titles and 302 weeks at No. 1, can match Wayne Ferreira’s streak of consecutive Grand Slam tournaments.
snippet: Roger Federer, who has chased down many marks, including 17 Grand Slam titles and 302 weeks at No. 1, can match Wayne Ferreira’s streak of consecutive Grand Slam tournaments.
